display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                      
[media]
# **The Legend Begins...**
A ruthless master rises. Vengeful emperors scheme. Peasants sharpen their blades. They all have something to prove—and only one path forward: **Kung Fu.**

[media]
# **Step Into Your Own Kung Fu Movie**
You’re not watching a Kung Fu movie—you’re in it. Dragon Fist delivers fast-paced melee combat powered by physics and real martial arts.

[media]
# **Hone in Your Skills**
Practice strikes, blocks, dodges, and combos. There is an endless amount of combat to explore.

[media]
# **Play Your Way**
- Campaign
- Multiplayer (up to 8)
- Co-op Campaign
- Training
- and More...

=========================

# New Map: The Cage

Brutality meets elegance in the newest stage for Dragon Fist. Get up close and personal with your opponents, and make every strike count in this tight, high-intensity arena!

Also, enjoy the festive holiday variant of The Cage for the month of December!


[media]

A ruthless master rises. Vengeful emperors scheme. Peasants sharpen their blades. They all have something to prove—and only one path forward: **Kung Fu.**

# **Step Into Your Own Kung Fu Movie**
You’re not watching a Kung Fu movie—you’re in it. Dragon Fist delivers fast-paced melee combat powered by physics and real martial arts.

![{"height":336,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031329_808578038151360_9197174225308918804_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=7Ma2yxW5_fEQ7kNvwGX3mO0&_nc_oc=AdlkULYwaHkoYFke9UQcVEKBiZGu6aevQucMvKqKbtaPQJyLlGHgo6uFJ6xQNTh23f0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=lyXuLJ0ulsaM_kWUP9Y4AA&oh=00_Afr34YLC8ZbKwuSiL_LUvLTDpmGxr2amzrCTyXudK4qjSQ&oe=695DD527)

Practice strikes, blocks, dodges, and combos. There is an endless amount of combat to explore.

# New Map: The Cage

Brutality meets elegance in the newest stage for Dragon Fist. Get up close and personal with your opponents, and make every strike count in this tight, high-intensity arena!

Also, enjoy the festive holiday variant of The Cage for the month of December!
